text:
@AnthemRespect @realDonaldTrump Guess what? 

#Remdesivir  is SAFE and EFFECTIVE against COVID-19

#Hydroxychloroquine has SERIOUS SIDE EFFECTS on the HEART when used for Covid-19 patients

Looks like you invested in the wrong coronavirus drug. 

Odd that you JUST HAPPENED to invest in a coronavirus drug. https://t.co/Ze2abq2vpr
